statements: SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services;
SELECT service_id, service_date, waste_type FROM hazardous_waste_services;
SELECT quantity, pickup_location, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_services;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT disposal_location, service_date FROM hazardous_waste_services ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE service_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_id, waste_type, quantity FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT service_date, pickup_location, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE waste_type = 'Hazardous' LIMIT 5;
SELECT quantity, waste_type, pickup_location FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE disposal_location = 'Incinerator A' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services WHERE service_date < '2022-06-01' AND disposal_location = 'Landfill B';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup;
SELECT pickup_date, pickup_location FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_status = 'scheduled';
SELECT id, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT pickup_location, pickup_status FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_date >= '2022-01-01' AND pickup_date <= '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT id, pickup_date, pickup_location FROM hazardous_waste_pickup WHERE pickup_status = 'Scheduled' ORDER BY pickup_date DESC;
SELECT disposal_location, disposal_date FROM waste_disposal WHERE disposal_method = 'Incineration' AND disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup JOIN waste_disposal ON hazardous_waste_pickup.pickup_location = waste_disposal.disposal_location;
SELECT pickup_location, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM hazardous_waste_pickup GROUP BY pickup_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services;
SELECT service_id, service_date, pickup_location FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services WHERE waste_type = 'Toxic Waste';
SELECT disposal_location, service_date FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services WHERE service_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_facilities ORDER BY facility_name DESC;
SELECT facility_id, facility_name, location FROM waste_disposal_facilities WHERE capacity_in_tons > 100 ORDER BY capacity_in_tons DESC;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services WHERE service_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_id, waste_type, pickup_location, disposal_location FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT service_id, service_date, pickup_location FROM hazardous_waste_pickup_services WHERE waste_type = 'Chemical' AND pickup_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT * FROM waste_disposal_facilities WHERE capacity_in_tons >= 100 ORDER BY facility_name ASC;
SELECT facility_name, location, capacity_in_tons FROM waste_disposal_facilities WHERE capacity_in_tons BETWEEN 200 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM schedules;
SELECT id, pickup_date, pickup_time FROM schedules WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT address, pickup_date FROM schedules ORDER BY pickup_date DESC;
SELECT quantity, status FROM pickups WHERE waste_type_id = 2 ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT id, name, description FROM waste_types WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM schedules WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT id, pickup_date, address FROM schedules WHERE pickup_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT pickups.id, schedules.pickup_date, waste_types.name, pickups.quantity FROM pickups INNER JOIN schedules ON pickups.schedule_id = schedules.id INNER JOIN waste_types ON pickups.waste_type_id = waste_types.id WHERE pickups.status = 'Completed';
SELECT waste_types.name, COUNT(*) AS total_pickups FROM pickups INNER JOIN waste_types ON pickups.waste_type_id = waste_types.id GROUP BY waste_types.name;

SELECT disposal_sites.name, disposal_sites.capacity, COUNT(pickups.id) AS total_pickups FROM disposal_sites LEFT JOIN schedules ON schedules.address = disposal_sites.address LEFT JOIN pickups ON pickups.schedule_id = schedules.id GROUP BY disposal_sites.name, disposal_sites.capacity;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services;
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT provider_name, specialization, contact_email FROM service_providers WHERE specialization = 'Hazardous Waste Management';
SELECT log_id, timestamp, log_details FROM service_logs WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM hazardous_waste_services
SELECT customer_name, contact_email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT provider_name, specialization FROM service_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC
SELECT site_name, location, capacity FROM waste_disposal_sites WHERE capacity > 1000
SELECT service_id, timestamp, log_details FROM service_logs WHERE service_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp
